DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy iStent trabecular micro-bypass stent reduce intraocular pressure ( IOP ) subject open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Glaukos Trabecular Micro-bypass Stent Open Angle Glaucoma Subjects 1 Stent Versus 2
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare 1 stent versus 2 stent .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed openangle glaucoma ( OAG ) Subject least one glaucoma medication Signed informed consent Angle closure glaucoma Secondary glaucoma except pseudoexfoliative pigmentary ; neovascular , uveitic angle recession glaucoma Prior glaucoma procedure ( eg trabeculectomy , viscocanalostomy , ALT , SLT , shunt implant , collagen implant , cyclo destructive procedure etc ) Fellow eye already enrol
